text: Did you like the first Steamworld Dig and wish it had more meat? Then this sequel is just for you. It builds on it without taking many risks, but ensures that it keeps what made the first one so enjoyable. Digging, finding gems, upgrading your equipment, uncovering secret paths... this all makes it very addictive. The soundtrack by El Huervo (did a couple Hotline Miami tracks) is also very nice. Get digging!
